觟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huà］
［《廣韻》胡瓦切，上馬，匣。］
有角的母羊。
[②]［xiè］
［《集韻》下買切，上蟹，匣。］
亦作“鮭4”。
(1)同“獬”。
(2)通“”。二心，离贰。

觟字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觟； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1141第13
【唐韻】下瓦切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】戸瓦切，?音踝。【說文】牝牂羊生角者也。　又【玉篇】角貌。　又矢名。【西京雜記】茂陵文固陽以觟矢射雉，日連百數。　又複姓。【後漢·儒林傳】中山觟陽鴻，以孟氏《易》敎授。【註】姓觟陽，名鴻也。或作鮭，从魚者，音胡佳反。　又【集韻】下買切，音蠏。與獬同。觸邪神羊也。【王充·論衡】觟?者，一角之羊也，性知有罪。臯陶治獄，其罪疑者，令羊觸之。【註】卽獬廌也。　又【廣韻】楚冠名。【淮南子·主術訓】楚文王好服觟冠。【註】御史法冠也。觟卽獬字。　又【字彙補】香跨切，音化。【淮南子·俶眞訓】萬民乃始慲觟離跂。【註】觟音化，徯徑之意也。

[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觟; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1141, 13
[Tang Yun] Xiawaqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Dowaqie, sound ankle. [Said the text] Sheep horns are also people.　[Jade articles] Angle appearance.　Again. [Xijing Miscellaneous] Maoling Wen Guyang shoots pheasants with sacred arrows, hundreds of days.　Re-surname again. [The Legend of the Later Han Dynasty of the Scholars] Zhongshan Jiaoyanghong, taught by Meng's "Yi". [Note] The surname is Fengyang and the name is Hongye. Or as salmon, those who follow the fish, the sound is Hu Jia.　[Jiyun] Next, buy and cut, sound. Same with Hao. Touch the evil god sheep too. [Wang Chong·Lunheng] Those who look at you, the sheep of one horn are also guilty of sexual knowledge. In Gaotao's imprisonment, the guilty suspects were touched by the sheep. [Note] 卽獬廌 also.　[Guangyun] Chu titled. 【Huainanzi·Master Skill Training】The king of Chu Wen was well served by the crown. [Note] Yushi Law Crown also.觟卽獬 word.　[Word Supplement] Fragrant cross-cut, phonetic. [Huainanzi·Fei Xun] Wanmin is the beginning of Yuan and Lizhen. [Note] The meaning of sounding is also the meaning of path.
